thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump to Make Announcement on Iran Nuclear Deal Tuesday

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Trump to Make Announcement on Iran Nuclear Deal Tuesday
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump said he would announce on Tuesday his decision on whether to withdraw from the Iran nuclear deal, which he has repeatedly criticized.
“I will be announcing my decision on the Iran Deal tomorrow from the White House at 2:00pm,” Mr. Trump tweeted Monday afternoon.
Mr. Trump repeatedly has threatened to withdraw... RELATED VIDEO What Is the 2015 Iran Nuclear Deal? Iran reached a historic agreement with major world powers over its nuclear program in 2015. Under the deal, what did Iran give up and how is it benefiting? WSJ’s Niki Blasina explains.
